title: Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), having consulted with the Garda Commissioner
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community 
Safety Act 2024 (Section 254(1)(n)) (Delegation of functions of Garda 
Commissioner) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (section 254(1)(n)) (delegation function garda commissioner) regulation 2025

title: Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), having consulted with the Garda Commissioner
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 2 April 2025.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 2 April 2025.

title: Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), having consulted with the Garda Commissioner
heading: 3. A reference in these Regulations –
text_raw:
3. A reference in these Regulations – 

(a) 

(b) 

to a section is a reference to a section of the Policing, Security 
and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), and 

to the assignment of a member of An Garda Síochána to 
alternative duties shall have the same meaning as it has in 
Regulation 8 of the Conduct Regulations.
text_norm: 3 reference regulation - (a) (b) section reference section policing security community safety act 2024 (no 1 2024) assignment member garda siochana alternative duty shall meaning regulation 8 conduct regulation

title: Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), having consulted with the Garda Commissioner
heading: 4. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the Garda Commissioner shall not delegate,
text_raw:
4. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the Garda Commissioner shall not delegate, 
under section 39, a function of the Garda Commissioner under the Conduct 
Regulations, other than to a member of An Garda Síochána of a rank not below 
the rank of Chief Superintendent. 

(2) The Garda Commissioner shall not delegate, under section 39, the 

function of– 

(a) 

(b) 

suspending under section 48(1) or 50(3), for a period of greater 
than 10 days, a member of An Garda Síochána pursuant to 
Regulation 7 of the Conduct Regulations, or 

assigning, for a period of greater than 10 days, a member of An 
Garda Síochána to alternative duties pursuant to Regulation 8 of 
the Conduct Regulations, 

other than to a member of An Garda Síochána of a rank not below the rank of 
Assistant Commissioner. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government approves of the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[114] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 April, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice.
